questions.quote: Okay, next item. Susan's doll collection. Estimated value: $2.6 million. What do you say we go through this doll by doll?
And then in the fifth inning, why did you take off on the pop fly?

Hey. Nice twirl you got there. You know who invented that, don't you?

You wanna buy it back? Why, you go drugs hidden in the trunk?
If I get it for you, will you take me to that club an' show me a good time?
